trans_title: 雷吉在中国 第一季
introduction: Reggie Yates has travelled to China for his latest documentary to shed light into what it's like growing up, living, and working in a country that holds the position of a global powerhouse.The new series follows the TV presenter as he embarks on a thought provoking and eye opening journey to various cities and meets the people who are responsible for transforming China.The hour long documentary will also feature Yates delving into China's past as he finds out about the history of the country's "miracle city" Shenzhen, which used to be home to just 30,000 people decades ago. It is now home to 12 million.Duolingo’s Scottish Gaelic course launched just before St Andrew’s Day.Duolingo sparks Gaelic boom among young ScotsBoris JohnsonJohnson refuses to recall Parliament to discuss Middle East crisis after US…a group of people on a stage© Provided by Johnston Publishing LtdReggie Yates has travelled to China for his latest documentary to shed light into what it's like growing up, living, and working in a country that holds the position of a global powerhouse.The new series follows the TV presenter as he embarks on a thought provoking and eye opening journey to various cities and meets the people who are responsible for transforming China.The hour long documentary will also feature Yates delving into China's past as he finds out about the history of the country's "miracle city" Shenzhen, which used to be home to just 30,000 people decades ago. It is now home to 12 million.Reggie Yates doing a trick on a skate board at a skate park© Provided by Johnston Publishing LtdAcross the three episodes in the series, Yates will visit various cities including: Huaqiangbei, Beijing, Shanghai and Chengdu.Here's all you need to know about Reggie In China.Yates heads to the 'miracle city' of Shenzhen that once used to be farmland and home to just 30,000 residents.
chinese_title: 雷吉在中国 第一季
